files.name: Tabs.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { TabsRoot, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'reka-ui';
import type { TabsRootEmits, TabsRootProps } from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<TabsRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<TabsRootEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <TabsRoot v-bind="forwarded">
    <slot />
  </TabsRoot>
</template>

files.name: TabsContent.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { TabsContent, type TabsContentProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<TabsContentProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <TabsContent
    :class="cn('mt-2 ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-hidden focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2', $attrs.class ?? '')"
    v-bind="props"
  >
    <slot />
  </TabsContent>
</template>

files.name: TabsList.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { TabsList, type TabsListProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<TabsListProps>();
</script>

<template>
  <TabsList
    v-bind="props"
    :class="cn(
      'flex items-center justify-center w-[fit-content] h-10 p-[2px] rounded-md bg-muted text-muted-foreground',
      $attrs.class ?? '',
    )"
  >
    <slot />
  </TabsList>
</template>

files.name: TabsTrigger.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { TabsTrigger, type TabsTriggerProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<TabsTriggerProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <TabsTrigger
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="cn(
      'inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-sm px-3 h-full text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-all focus-visible:outline-hidden focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=active]:bg-input data-[state=active]:text-foreground data-[state=active]:shadow-sm',
      $attrs.class ?? '',
    )"
  >
    <slot />
  </TabsTrigger>
</template>

files.name: index.ts
